overview: I came, for a few days time to one of the strictest nuns order of France : the Cistercian Order of the Strict Observance. This film is the experience of an encounter with enclosed Cistercian nuns, it displays as introspective wondering. As the movies goes on, women's portraits start standing out also, questions formed about our relationship with others as well as nature, time and consumerism.
title: Le temps de quelques jours
